title: Best of The Program | Guests: Nicole Arbour & TX State Rep. Kyle Biedermann | 12/16/20
description:
Texas State Rep. Kyle Biedermann joins to discuss proposing a bill that’ll allow Texans to vote on secession. Glenn reviews the stats: How many Americans know about the Great Reset, and how many want it? Comedian Nicole Arbour discusses her journey from Hollywood liberal to Trump-supporting conservative.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
